comments.comments_text: Theo Hernandez produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box, where Alessio Romagnoli (AC Milan) rises high to head the ball into the left side of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper. He makes it 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Nice footballing skills by Gianluca Scamacca (Sassuolo)! He receives a pass and without any hesitation whatsoever unloads a beautiful howitzer of a strike from long distance. His superb effort finds its way into the top right corner via the woodwork. What a goal!
